text: Woo Chan-yang (; born 27 April 1997) is a South Korean football defender who plays for Pohang Steelers and the South Korea national under-20 football team. == Club career == Woo joined Pohang Steelers in 2016http://www.kleague.com/KOR_2016/record/data_7.asp?player=20160127 kleague.com and made his league debut against Gwangju FC on 3 July 2016.https://int.soccerway.com/players/chan-yang-woo/434292/ soccerway.com == International career == He has been a member of the South Korea national U-20 team since 2015.http://www.kfa.or.kr/national/player.asp?Query=Grade%3DMU20%26Sumons%3D1396%26Player%3D15702 kfa.or == Club career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | continental ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
